MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Halkyn Street, Coleshill Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:51AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30AM on 22nd October 2020
